title: Man holding a banner and newspaper
description: Photographer's description: Protestors before & after Mubarak and how they show happy, photos of Ahmed Shafik speaking at his place. Text in image: استمارة 6 ثوار - الدستور أخيرا تنحى -  الجيش يتعهد لادارة البلد. Translation of Text in image: 6 rebel form -  Al Dostoor: He Finally stepped Down- Army vows to run the country.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Press coverage; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
